title: Day 6 FAQ - WARM UP
description: The importance of warming up before trading, journaling, and building trading routines.
content:
In this lesson, you'll learn:

• Why warming up before trading is crucial
• Pre-trading routine practices
• Pattern recognition improvement
• Journaling for self-improvement
• Building consistency through routine
• Reducing emotional impulsiveness

quiz.question: Warm-up before trading helps improve:
quiz.explanation: Warm-up routines help traders get into the right mental state and reduce emotional trading.

quiz.question: Reviewing previous trades improves:
quiz.explanation: Reviewing past trades helps you recognize patterns and learn from your mistakes.

quiz.question: A trading routine builds:
quiz.explanation: Consistent routines create discipline and predictable trading behavior.

quiz.question: Journaling helps identify:
quiz.explanation: Journaling reveals patterns in your trading errors and emotional decisions.

quiz.question: Preparation reduces:
quiz.explanation: Well-prepared traders make thoughtful decisions rather than impulsive emotional trades.
